html:
Canon USA is having a sale on a couple of refurbished camera bodies. The Canon EOS RP is by far the most affordable full-frame camera out there at only $519 refurbished. The EOS RP is currently $899 authorized retailers.

Purchase Options

  • Canon EOS RP $519
  • Canon EOS R5 $2299

Canon EOS RP Features

  • 26.2MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor
  • DIGIC 8 Image Processor
  • UHD 4K and Full HD 1080 Video
  • 2.36m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder
  • 3″ 1.04m-Dot Vari-Angle Touchscreen LCD
  • Dual Pixel CMOS AF, 4779 AF Points
  • ISO 100-40000, Up to 5 fps Shooting
  • Wi-Fi and Bluetooth Connectivity

Canon also has the Canon EOS R5 down to $2299. Thats a bit higher than their Black Friday sale pricing, but that only comes once a year, so this is still a great deal. The EOS R5 is $3399 from authorized retailers at the moment.

Canon EOS R5 Features

  • 45MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor
  • DIGIC X Image Processor
  • 8K30 Raw and 4K120 10-Bit Internal Video
  • 400MP In-Camera Files with No Software
  • Sensor-Shift 5-Axis Image Stabilization
  • 12 fps Mech. Shutter, 20 fps E. Shutter
  • Dual Pixel CMOS AF II with 1053 Points
  • 3.2″ Vari-Angle Touchscreen LCD
  • Subject Tracking with Deep Learning
  • CFexpress & SD UHS-II Memory Card Slots

As always, refurbished gear from Canon USA comes with a full 1-year Canon USA warranty.

Purchase Options

  • Canon EOS RP $519
  • Canon EOS R5 $2299

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
